name: nightshade
content:

Add to word list
any of a large family of plants including tomatoes, potatoes, and some poisonous plants: Nightshades are popular in vegan recipes and are good for concentration and mental focus. Some of the plants in the nightshade family are extremely poisonous.
More examplesFewer examplesThe tomato is a member of the nightshade family.Common edible nightshades include potato, aubergine, and red pepper.I don’t cook with nightshades very much any more as I have found that they give me stomachache.
